com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.services

Interface FileRepositoryRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileManagerImpl

    public interface FileRepositoryRegistry
    Management service to manage the registered FileRepository instances.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    FileManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileRepository getRepository(String repositoryId)
      Returns the FileRepository to use for the given repositoryId.
      Collection<FileRepository> listRepositories() 
      FileRepository registerRepository(FileRepository fileRepository)
      Adds a FileRepository to the registry.
      boolean repositoryExists(String repositoryId)
      Checks if a FileRepository with the given id exists.
      void setFileRepositoryFactory(FileRepositoryFactory factory)
      Set the FileRepositoryFactory that should be used if a repository is looked up for the first time, but no repository is registered yet under that id.

    • Method Detail

      • setFileRepositoryFactory

        void setFileRepositoryFactory(FileRepositoryFactory factory)
        Set the FileRepositoryFactory that should be used if a repository is looked up for the first time, but no repository is registered yet under that id.
        Parameters:
        factory - FileRepositoryFactory instance or null.

      • getRepository

        FileRepository getRepository(String repositoryId)
        Returns the FileRepository to use for the given repositoryId. If no FileRepository is registered yet under that name, the factory will be called to create one. Depending on the factory a new repository will actually get created or null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        repositoryId - Id of the file repository.
        Returns:
        FileRepository instance or null if none registered or created.

      • repositoryExists

        boolean repositoryExists(String repositoryId)
        Checks if a FileRepository with the given id exists. Will not attempt to create it if it does not.
        Parameters:
        repositoryId - Id of the file repository.
        Returns:
        True if a FileRepository is registered with that id.

      • registerRepository

        FileRepository registerRepository(FileRepository fileRepository)
        Adds a FileRepository to the registry. This will replace the currently registered repository with that name. This method can return a different instance of the FileRepository that is supposed to be used instead of the original passed in. The default FileManagerImpl wraps provided FileRepository instances in a FileRepositoryDelegate so they can be replaced at runtime.
        Parameters:
        fileRepository - FileRepository instance.
        See Also:
        FileRepositoryDelegate

      • listRepositories

        Collection<FileRepository> listRepositories()
        Returns:
        collection of all registered repositories
